events.name: Tad's Hack-a-thon
events.about:
HEY PROGRAMMERS! 

When: Wednesday May 9th from 6:30pm till 10:30pm. 
             Pizza will be available starting at 6:00.

Where: Crown’s Dayton Office - 7750 Paragon Rd. Dayton, Ohio 45459

The Challenge for May 9th:

  • Build a functional single page website with limited frameworks in php/HTML5. The sites functionality requirements and other details will be given at the start of the challenge.
  • You will need to bring your own laptop with some type of web server (wamp, xampp, mampp) on it.

Prizes: 

  • First Place:                   $200
  • Second Place:              $100
  • Third Place:                  $50
